body: Typically sent on the most sensitive missions, elite forces of hobgoblin soldiers can single-handedly turn the tides of deadlocked conflicts. Their military precision is renowned, and their ability to succeed at assassinations, sabotage, and reconnaissance deep behind enemy lines makes them as important as entire battalions of foot soldiers.
name: Elite Strike Force
